Instruction: Combine egg, Worcestershire sauce, mayonnaise, parsley, seafood seasoning, baking powder, and salt in a large mixing bowl. Tear bread pieces into small bits, then mix them into the egg mixture. Gently fold in crabmeat, form the mixture into 4 cakes, and place them on a baking sheet lined with parchment.
Preheat your oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit (190 degrees Celsius).
Bake the crab cakes until they are golden brown and heated through, which typically takes around 30 minutes.
